TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonDialogLauncher implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示组上的标准化小图标，可用于打开对话框。

span.span: Represents a small standardized icon on a group that can be used to open a dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A右下角的一组默认显示。A is displayed in the lower-right corner of a group by default. ， ，和属性有明显的效果时显示在功能区上的组。The , , and properties have no visible effect when the is displayed in a group on the Ribbon. 但是，当用户添加到快速访问工具栏中，这些属性控制显示图像的行为。However, when a user adds a to the Quick Access Toolbar, these properties control the behavior of the image that is shown. 此外，属性不会隐藏快速访问工具栏上显示时。Also, the property does not hide the when it is displayed on the Quick Access Toolbar. 用户可以添加到通过快速访问工具栏**功能区 (XML)**项。The user can add the to the Quick Access Toolbar through the **Ribbon (XML)** item. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md). 仅适用于。The applies only to a . 对象具有的成员类型。The object has a member of the type. 有关如何添加到，请参阅[如何： 向功能区组添加对话框启动器](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md)。For information about how to add a to a , see [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md). 你可以创建通过使用在运行时方法对象。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，可以设置此控件的某些属性。Some properties of this control can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application. 有关设置这些属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For information about setting these properties, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将添加单击时，则功能区组以及如何启动自定义对话框，使用户能够选择高级设置的右下角中的图标。The following example shows how to add a to a Ribbon group and how to launch a custom dialog that enables users to choose advanced settings when they click on the icon in the lower right corner of the . 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项到 Office 项目。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 添加到默认组`Group1`中所述[如何： 向功能区组添加对话框启动器](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md)。Add a to the default group `Group1` as outlined in [How to: Add a Dialog Box Launcher to a Ribbon Group](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-a-dialog-box-launcher-to-a-ribbon-group.md). 3. 如果你使用的 Visual Basic，添加新**对话框**到项目的项。If you are using Visual Basic, add a new **Dialog** item to the project. 如果你使用的 C#，添加新**Windows 窗体**项，然后将其转换为一个对话框，通过添加**确定**和**取消**按钮到窗体并创建为按钮的单击事件处理程序事件。If you are using C#, add a new **Windows Form** item and turn it into a dialog by adding **OK** and **Cancel** buttons to the form and by creating event handlers for the buttons' click events. 4. 设置**（名称）**属性到对话框`advancedSettingsDialog`。Set the **(Name)** property of the dialog to `advancedSettingsDialog`. 通过添加控件并设置更多属性，可以自定义对话框。You can customize the dialog by adding controls and setting more properties. 5. 添加到你的代码的事件处理程序。Add the event handler to your code. 6. 将以下方法到的内容放事件处理程序。Place the contents of the following method into the event handler. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#10](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.Designer.cs#10)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#10](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.Designer.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用此 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this is enabled.
if the is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个图像，在将其添加到快速访问工具栏时，它将在此 上显示。

span.span: Gets or sets an image that appears on this when it is added to the Quick Access Toolbar.

value.span: 一个图像，在将其添加到快速访问工具栏时，它将在此 上显示。

span.span: An image that appears on this when it is added to the Quick Access Toolbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的图像格式是 PNG，因为 PNG 格式的图像支持通过其 alpha 通道的透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel. 属性具有明显的效果时显示在功能区上的组。The property has no visible effect when the is displayed in a group on the Ribbon. 但是，当用户添加到快速访问工具栏中，此属性控制显示图像的行为。However, when a user adds a to the Quick Access Toolbar, this property controls the behavior of the image that is shown. 属性标识由控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，将更新控件的外观，以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 如果设置属性，和属性会被忽略。If the property is set, the and properties are ignored. 尽管属性提供更好地控制比其他两个属性，因为每次对控件进行更新时，图像对象被发送到 Office 应用程序会比较慢。Although the property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标识符，它用于在此 添加到快速访问工具栏时将图像分配给它。

span.span: Gets or sets an identifier that is used to assign an image to this when it is added to the Quick Access Toolbar.

value.span: 一个标识符，它用于在此 添加到快速访问工具栏时将图像分配给它。

span.span: An identifier that is used to assign an image to this when it is added to the Quick Access Toolbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). 属性具有明显的效果时显示在功能区上的组。The property has no visible effect when the is displayed in a group on the Ribbon. 但是，当用户添加到快速访问工具栏中，此属性控制所示，映像的行为，除非或也设置属性。However, when a user adds a to the Quick Access Toolbar, this property controls the behavior of the image that is shown, unless the or property is also set. 属性标识由控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. Office 应用程序检索此映像从你的解决方案一次，以提高性能。The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance. 此属性可以设置仅在设计时，因为它标识的图像加载期间事件。This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the event. 时将引发一次每个映像名称将显示功能区。 is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed. 之后，无法使用此属性更改控件图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property. 若要加载的映像，将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load the image, add code to the event handler. 检查属性并设置属性到想要加载的映像的对象。Check the property of the and set the property of the object to the image that you want to load. 如果忽略此属性属性或属性设置。This property is ignored if either the property or the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以由标识的图像以外会稍微快一些加载显示属性，因为 Office 应用程序将检索映像你解决方案仅在首次从功能区。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed.

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for this .

value.span: 此 的当前键盘快捷键。

span.span: The current keyboard shortcut for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快捷键提示必须包含 1 到 3 个大写字符，并且必须包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. 键提示有时也称为访问密钥或快捷键，可用作激活控件的快捷组合键。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 当你按下 ALT 键时，键提示将显示在功能区上。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果内置控件或从其他加载项，则与键提示中你快捷键提示相冲突，Microsoft Office 可能自动分配不冲突快捷键提示值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用键盘来使用功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).

summary.span: 如果要使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置要在此 上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display on this , if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

value.span: Microsoft Office 图标的 ID，该图标将在此 上显示。

span.span: The ID of the Microsoft Office icon to display on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识由控件显示 Office 图标。The property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control. 属性值是一个字符串，标识`imageMso`所选图标的值。The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，将更新控件的外观，以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 有关的列表`imageMso`值，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页面[Office 2010 外接程序： 图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760). 如果忽略此属性属性设置。This property is ignored if the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以由标识的图像以外会稍微快一些加载属性，因为这些图像缓存在 Office 应用程序。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the images are cached in the Office application.

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，此 是其成员。

span.span: Gets a object of which this is a member.

value.span: 一个 对象，此 是其成员。

span.span: A object of which this is a member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以添加到在设计时或在运行时在功能区加载到 Microsoft Office 应用程序之前。You can add a to a at design time, or at run time before the Ribbon is loaded into the Microsoft Office application. 因此，加载功能区后，将不会更改属性。Therefore, the property will not change after the Ribbon is loaded. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResumeLayout() cil managed

span.span: Reverses the effect of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次调用时，内部计数器即会递增。Every time is called, an internal counter is incremented. 递减此相同的计数器。 decrements this same counter. 当此内部计数器变为等于零时，Microsoft Office 重绘控件。When this internal counter becomes equal to zero, Microsoft Office redraws the control.

span.span: Gets the on which this is placed.
The on which this is placed.

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到 上方时显示的提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

value.span: 用户将指针移到控件上方时显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必须少于 1024年个字符的长度。The value must be less than 1024 characters in length. 当设置属性，值将显示的标题为。When the property is set, the value appears as the title of the .

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到 上时显示的多行提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

value.span: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains multiline tip text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。The string must be less than 1024 characters in length. 下显示文本。The appears under text. 与不同、字符串中的启用分行符。Unlike the , the enables line breaks in the string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SuspendLayout() cil managed

summary.span: 阻止 Microsoft Office 应用程序刷新 中的控件状态。

span.span: Prevents the Microsoft Office application from refreshing the state of controls in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用可能会导致性能稍有增加，如果你的应用程序具有很多会频繁更新的控件。Calling might result in a slight performance increase if your application has many controls that are frequently updated. 更改每个控件的状态后，你可以调用以允许 UI 进行刷新。After you change the state of each control, you can call to allow the UI to be refreshed. 每次调用时，内部计数器即会递增。Every time is called, an internal counter is incremented. 递减此相同的计数器。 decrements this same counter. 当此内部计数器变为等于零时，Microsoft Office 重绘控件。When this internal counter becomes equal to zero, Microsoft Office redraws the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this is visible.

value.span: 如果 可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is visible; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A右下角的一组默认显示。A is displayed in the lower-right corner of a group by default. 当位于此默认位置，属性确定是否这可见。When a is in this default position, the property determines whether this is visible. 但是，属性未包含任何时生效快速访问工具栏上显示。However, the property has no effect when the is displayed on the Quick Access Toolbar. 例如，如果这两个快速访问工具栏和对其组所属可见，然后设置属性`false`将导致上组消失，但上快速访问工具栏将保持可见。For example, if both the Quick Access Toolbar and the group to which the belongs are visible, then setting the property to `false` will cause the on the group to disappear, but the one on the Quick Access Toolbar will remain visible. 此外，设置属性`false`不会影响是否快速访问工具栏上启用。In addition, setting the property to `false` does not affect whether the on the Quick Access Toolbar is enabled. 若要禁用它，请将设置其属性`false`。To disable it, set its property to `false`.
